summary: New York police officer Ralph Sarchie investigates a series of crimes. He joins forces with an unconventional priest, schooled in the rites of exorcism, to combat the possessions that are terrorizing their city.
cast: Eric Bana|Edgar Ramírez|Olivia Munn|Chris Coy|Dorian Missick|Sean Harris|Joel McHale|Mike Houston|Lulu Wilson|Olivia Horton|Scott Johnsen|Daniel Sauli|Antoinette LaVecchia|Aidan Gemme|Jenna Gavigan|Skylar Toddings|Sebastian La Cause|Steve Hamm|Sean Nelson|Mari-Ange Ramirez|Ben Horner|Tijuana Ricks|John Cariani|Robert Keiley|Blair Sams|Mark David Watson|Ben Livingston|Kevin Nagle|Oliver Wadsworth|Lolita Foster|Carmen Ortiz-Girdauskas|Victor Pagan|Carol Stanzione|Adam Kobylarz|Lauro David Chartrand-DelValle|John Auer|Joseph Basile|Sean Bennett|Lyndsey Bloise|José Báez|Ivan Cardona|John Cenatiempo|Mikhael DeVille|Dennis Jay Funny|Raiden Integra|Joseph Anthony Jerez|Umar Khan|Amra Mallassi|Valentina Rendón
title: Líbranos del mal
